Eric, Aden, and I left Bozeman at 6 AM on Monday, May 12 - driving through Eastern Montana to Aberdeen, SD. We purchased welded metal fencing from Menards in Aberdeen.

:::{.columns}

::: {.column width="33%" .px-2}
[![Metal fencing](Pictures/fencing.jpeg)](Pictures/fencing.jpeg){data-fancybox="gallery" data-caption="Metal fencing"}
:::

::: {.column width="33%" .px-2}
[![Tag for the fencing](Pictures/fencing2.jpeg)](Pictures/fencing2.jpeg){data-fancybox="gallery" data-caption="Tag for the fencing"}
:::

:::

On Tuesday morning, we left Aberdeen and headed North to the [Sand Lake National Wildlife Refuge](https://www.fws.gov/refuge/sand-lake).

# Sand Lake 

## *Rhinusa pilosa* Monitoring Grids

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=45.80185,-99.203277" target="_blank">Exclosure grid location</a>

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=45.80234,-99.203777" target="_blank">Control grid location</a>


Site activities:

- Setup exclosure and control grid  
- Build exclosure  
- Retrieve weather data from data loggers  
- Setup trail cameras to monitor herbivory
 
:::{.columns}

## *Mecinus janthinus* Cage & Release

After completing the exclosure and control grids, we drove down to another section of the Sand Lake NWR to set up a *Mecinus janthinus* release cage and release *M. janthinus* biocontrol agents. 

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=45.912467,-99.279119" target="_blank">Cage release location</a>

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=45.912312, -99.279233" target="_blank">Open release location</a>

Site activities:  

- Build release cage ontop of existing monitoring transect
- Release *M. janthinus* biocontrol agents in cage and in open release transect
- Retrieve weather data from data loggers

:::{.columns}

::: {.column width="33%" .px-2}
[![Sand Lake biocontrol release site](Pictures/sl_releasesite.jpeg)](Pictures/sl_releasesite.jpeg){data-fancybox="gallery" data-caption="Sand Lake biocontrol release site"}
:::

::: {.column width="33%" .px-2}
[![Sand Lake cage setup](Pictures/sl_setupcage.jpeg)](Pictures/sl_setupcage.jpeg){data-fancybox="gallery" data-caption="Sand Lake cage setup"}
:::

::: {.column width="33%" .px-2}
[![Sand Lake *M. janthinus* release](Pictures/sl_release.jpeg)](Pictures/sl_release.jpeg){data-fancybox="gallery" data-caption="Sand Lake <em>M. janthinus</em> release"}
:::

# Schaunaman Ranch 

After completing work at Sand Lake, we headed back to Aberdeen to visit our other site - the Schaunaman Ranch just outside of town. 

## *Rhinusa pilosa* Monitoring Grids

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=45.407562255859375,-98.55270385742188" target="_blank">Exclosure grid location</a>

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=45.4073371887207, -98.55327606201172" target="_blank">Control grid location</a>

Site activities:  

- Build exclosure around existing monitoring grid
- Retrieve weather data from data loggers  
- Setup trail cameras at both the exclosure and control grid

:::{.columns}
